name: become worm (2/10)
description:
Slither, Eat, Squirm, and Become Worm.

A game by Bokonon and Yossarian.

Ominous Hum by TurgidHarrier

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • R - Restart

This is our one, and unfortunately, only submission for the #varietymegajam2020 hosted by Droqen. We had a few other prototypes in the works but couldn't squeeze anymore out in time!

The theme for this submission was the 2nd prompt:
